name: Feudal Fight
description:
Feudal Fight is a 2D multiplayer platforming arena fighter built for PC inspired by Smash and Samurai Gunn. It features easy to learn mechanics for fast-paced gameplay. 

Play against your friends in local multiplayer by dashing, slashing, throwing ninja stars, and shooting a grappling hook to move around!

Controls

You can play using the keyboard, XBOX, PS4, or Nintendo Switch Pro controllers.

ControlKeyboardGamepadNavigationWASD/ Arrow keysLeft stickSelectEnterSouth buttonCancelESCEast buttonMoveWASD/ Arrow keysLeft stickAimMouseLeft / right stickGrappling hookELeft triggerDashShiftEast buttonJumpSpaceSouth buttonMeleeLeft clickWest buttonShurikenRight clickRight trigger
